snippet: The C.I.A. is using the remarks of Iran’s supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, to gain insight into the geopolitical gamesmanship now at play over Iran’s nuclear program.
abstract: Central Intelligence Agency is using remarks made by Iran’s supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei to gain insight into the geopolitical gamesmanship now at play over Iran’s nuclear program; Khamenei's remarks about nuclear weapons are sometimes contradictory, but analysts say the United States can exploit what he says.
lead_paragraph: The C.I.A. is using the remarks of Iran’s supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, to gain insight into the geopolitical gamesmanship now at play over Iran’s nuclear program.

headline.main: Seeking Nuclear Insight in Fog of the Ayatollah’s Utterances
headline.print_headline: Seeking Nuclear Insight in Fog Of the Ayatollah’s Utterances
